embeds.title: __Commands__
embeds.description: bot commands with their specific parameter options, the format is 'parameter:type' so that you can see what to put in each command and in what order

fields.name: -clean
fields.value:
Clean 'Num:Whole number'
Clean 'Num:Whole number' 'User:Mention/ID'
Clean 'User:Mention/ID' 'Num:Whole number'

[-r Regex:Text]
[-ma Max age:Duration]
[-minage Min age:Duration]
[-i Regex case insensitive:Switch]
[-nopin Ignore pinned messages:Switch]
